title: Portable Software Mix Collection DC 2016.08.06
description:
*** About this release ***

This collection includes the latest versions of various useful Windows apps.

All applications were virtualized using the latest version of VMWare Thinapp (except for 'Natively portable' ones, which ensures they run on any Windows version (tested on Windows 10 64-bit).
VMWare ThinApp USB versions do not write files nor registry entries to the host computer.
Instead, they deploy all necessary data to a subfolder along the executable.

Automatic updates and internet connections were disabled whenever such options are made available in the program's option ([b]always block any internet connection attempt with your firewall or disconnect from the internet[/b]).

Applications are registered and/or patched, you will be able to run them from any location (folder, USB drive).
Some applications are system specific (32-bit/64-bit), others will run on both systems.
Files associations and Windows explorer context menus are not available.
You can however create file associations by right-clicking on a file, then select 'Open with' and point to the portable executable.

All files were scanned with ESET Smart Security (updated 2016.08.06)

Usage: unpack to a directory of your choice and launch your favourite application.
Size (all archives unpacked): 1.64 GB

*** Included in this release ***

* Audio
WavePad Sound Editor Masters Edition 6.55 (NCH Software)

* Authoring tools
CHM Editor 3.0.8 (create, edit and translate CHM files - GridinSoft)
Help & Manual Pro 7.1.0.3925 (authoring tool for software documentation and easy content management)
WinCHM Pro 5.125 (Help authoring software - Softany)

* CD DVD tools
Nero 7 Ultra Edition 7.9.6.0 (good old and light version - Burning ROM and Nero Express only)

* E-book
eBook Converter Bundle 3.17.703.391 (all in one ebook converter)

* File and folder managers
Directory List and Print Pro 3.19 (list and print the content of any directory - Infonautics)
SyncBackPro 7.6.28.0 (professional's tool to backup, synchronize, and restore data files - 2BrightSparks)

* Graphic tools
TSR Watermark Image Pro 3.5.6.2 (quick and simple batch watermarking)

* Office tools 
FileLocator Pro 8.0.2658 (fast and powerful text search engine - Mythicsoft)
PDF Eraser Pro 1.6.3 (delete text, logos, unnecessary objects from PDF)
PDF to DWG Converter 2017 v3.7.0.2 (convert PDF to AutoCAD DWG - AutoDWG)
WinPDFEditor 3.2.2.4 (modify and edit PDF document)

* System info
HWiNFO 5.34 Natively portable freeware (in-depth hardware information)
CPU-Z 1.77 Natively portable freeware (system profiler)

* System tweak
Ace Utilities 6.2.1.290 (system maintenance utilities for Windows - AceLogics)
ShellNewHandler (GUI tool to enable-disable ShellNew entrys)
WinTools.net Premium 16.7.1 (increase Windows performance)

* Text editors]
HippoEDIT 1.60.22 (text editor for power users, developers, and programmers)
PilotEdit 9.7.0 (a powerful file editor capable of editing huge files)

* Video tools
ConvertXtoVideo Ultimate 2.0.0.27 (VSO Software)
DVD-Cloner Blu-ray Pro 13.50.1417 (make perfect 1-1 copy of your DVD movies - OpenCloner)
YouTube Downloader 5.7.2.0 (GreenTree Aplications)
